MagazineGroup.Name: culture
MagazineGroup.Title: Culture and contemporary life
MagazineGroup.SubTitle: Copenhagen also serves as the cultural hub of Denmark and wider Scandinavia.
MagazineGroup.Html:
Apart from being the national capital, Copenhagen also serves as the cultural hub of Denmark and wider Scandinavia. Since the late 1990s, Copenhagen has undergone a transformation from a small Scandinavian capital to a metropolitan city of international scope in the league of cities like Barcelona and Amsterdam. This is due to massive investments in infrastructure as well as culture and a wave of new successful Danish architects, designers and chefs. As with the rest of Denmark the inhabitants of Copenhagen tend to be happy.

Copenhagen Fashion Week takes place every year in February and August. It is the largest fashion event in Northern Europe.

MagazineGroup.Name: Transportation
MagazineGroup.Title: Transportation
MagazineGroup.SubTitle: The greater Copenhagen area has a very well established transportation infrastructure making it a hub in Northern Europe.
